alert.note: Alert for Upper Kuskokwim Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 20 at 1:18PM AKST until February 23 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 18 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Upper Kuskokwim Valley. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening through Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Two storms will impact the area. The first system will arrive early Tuesday evening with a brief break Wednesday morning before the next system moves into the area Wednesday evening.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
